com.rigado.rigablue

Interface IRigLeBaseDeviceObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RigFirmwareUpdateService

    public interface IRigLeBaseDeviceObserver
    This interface provides methods for getting state updates from RigLeBaseDevice objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void didUpdateNotifyState(RigLeBaseDevice device, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
      This method is called when notifications are successfully enabled or disabled for a characteristic.
      void didUpdateValue(RigLeBaseDevice device, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
      This method is called when the value for a characteristic changes either due to an asynchronous notification or if the value of the characteristic was requested via a read operation.
      void didWriteValue(RigLeBaseDevice device, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
      This method is called when the value for a characteristic has been successfully written by the low level android APIs.
      void discoveryDidComplete(RigLeBaseDevice device)
      This method is called when discovery of characteristic and services completes after calling the runDiscovery method.

    • Method Detail

      • didUpdateValue

        void didUpdateValue(RigLeBaseDevice device,
                    android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        This method is called when the value for a characteristic changes either due to an asynchronous notification or if the value of the characteristic was requested via a read operation.
        Parameters:
        device - The device for which the characteristic value updated
        characteristic - The characteristic that updated

      • didUpdateNotifyState

        void didUpdateNotifyState(RigLeBaseDevice device,
                          android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        This method is called when notifications are successfully enabled or disabled for a characteristic.
        Parameters:
        device - The device for which the characteristic state changed
        characteristic - The characteristic for which notifications were enabled

      • didWriteValue

        void didWriteValue(RigLeBaseDevice device,
                   android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        This method is called when the value for a characteristic has been successfully written by the low level android APIs.
        Parameters:
        device - The device for which the characteristic value was written
        characteristic - The characteristic which had its value written

      • discoveryDidComplete

        void discoveryDidComplete(RigLeBaseDevice device)
        This method is called when discovery of characteristic and services completes after calling the runDiscovery method.
        Parameters:
        device - The device for which discovery completed.
        See Also:
        RigLeBaseDevice.runDiscovery()
